title: PES CSE/AIML or Tier-2 IIITs CSE/AI-DS
content:
Will be getting tier-2 IIITs CSE/ECE(Guwahati, Kota, Vadodra, Nagpur, Ranchi)

Also LNMIIT-CSE and Thapar-COPC

And NITs(except top 3) Civil,Mechanical,Chemical

comments.body:
If money isn't a problem then PES , its the only good pvt clg in Bangalore other than RVCE 

But the overall investment will go upto 25+ lakh
So u can prefer tier2 IIITs as well
IIIT Guwahati / Vadodara cse  ;-; not even a question
I said ROI wise tho , check placement stats on their website or through seniors
No asking in general as in comparing the univ  u commented ?

Its decent , their cse median package went around 8 lpa 
Manipal has a great campus life as i heard tho
Ook I left pesu counselling as manipal cse is more or less confirmed for me
Their counselling fking charges 5 lakh in advance , even i left tho
Where are u thinking to join?
tier-2 IIITs or a top uni of my state (results awaiting)
I got 384 in comedk will get rv cs should I prefer it or pes cce maybe
what's your rank for being so confirmed ðŸ˜­ I just got 1500
